Player History
Won World Championship with Detroit in 1965...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1965...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1966, hitting .381 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 6/16/1966...
Injured on 4/11/1967 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 5-6 weeks...
Drove in 7 runs against California on 7/19/1967...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/19/1969, off Don Loun (TEX)...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/1/1970 to a 1-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1972...
Injured on 8/18/1973 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 8-9 weeks...
Injured on 6/3/1975 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 8-9 weeks...
Injured on 6/16/1977 with a Sore Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 7/21/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1978, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1978, going 3-1, 1.24...
Injured on 4/16/1980 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/2/1982 to a 3-year deal worth $600,000 per year...
Injured on 4/26/1982 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1985, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1985...
Injured on 10/3/1986 with a Broken Finger, out for 4-5 weeks...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/26/1987 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1987...
Injured on 5/24/1988 with a Torn Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 9/29/1989 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
